a.span: 2020-2021 Dual Immersion Program Application Period Opens

All families interested in kindergarten at MMES next year must complete an application to be eligible for enrollment, including those who have older siblings in the dual immersion program. / Todas las familias interesadas en kindergarten en MMES el próximo año deben completar este formulario para ser elegibles para la inscripción, incluidas aquellas con hermanos mayores en el programa de doble inmersión.
Tune in to KHOL to listen to Teacher reading Esperanza Rising

strong.a: Download the TCSD app from your App Store

p.br: Get district news, events and important updates on your mobile device by downloading our new app today!

p.strong: TCSD Shares Important District Data and Reports
p.br: Visit our School District and School Data and Reporting page to learn more about how our schools are performing.

Many local organizations provide after-school programs and service that are not affiliated with TCSD. As we become aware of these programs we post them on the Community After-school Programs and Services page available here. Be sure to check the page often as updates are made to this page regularly, especially in the spring and fall.

div.p: This School District is committed to a policy of nondiscrimination in relation to age, sex, race, color, religion, national origin sexual orientation, gender identity or disability. This policy governs all matters concerning staff, students, education programs and services and individuals with whom the School District does business.
